metadata.dc:author: Samhan, K A
metadata.dc:description: In this article, I present the case of a 55-year old male patient suffering from urinary tuberculosis associated with cancer of the bladder, discovered by chance as the result of an urological investigation for cystitis and in whom both processes apparently had a long evolution without becoming clinically apparent. I comment upon the methods of diagnosis and treatment and finally present the results and conclusions.
metadata.dc:title: Tuberculosis urinaria y c√°ncer vesical.
[Urinary tuberculosis and bladder cancer].
